response.overview: The award winning ‘Turn for the Better’ is the intermediate windsurfer’s ultimate encyclopaedia covering all the essentials from getting planing through to carving manoeuvres and tricks. At over 2 hours long this is the most comprehensive program ever and has been lauded worldwide for its wonderful clarity. Directed by award winning cameraman Simon Normington, it really is a wonderfully polished and professional piece of work.
response.title: Turn for the Better
